item.description:
Fellow Indie Rock Lovers,

Owen is going to be playing a show at ICC (Allston) on Saturday, December 8th at 7:30 (doors at 7:00). There is a great vegan thai place that is in short walking distance of the church. The restaurant is called the Grasshopper. I was thinking that we could meetup before the show at about 5:45 and have some great thai food and walk over to the church. (No, it is not actually christian music) This would also be a great time to hit up the Hookah Bar on Brighton Ave in Allston. If you haven't listened to Owen, here is his myspace page.

http://www.myspace.co...

This will be his first headlining performance in quite some time and he is only playing a couple shows. I've seen him tour with such acts as Rocky Votolato, Appleseed Cast and Kevin Devine. Tix are only $10 and I don't think you would have a problem getting them at the door. Should be a mellow show and definitely some good Thai food before.
item.name: Owen - ICC - December 8th
